help.name: help
help.description: Shows the help to the sub action / plugin

init.name: init
init.description: Initial the 'Heringsfish' server config in the current project

create-domain.name: create-domain
create-domain.description: Creates the domain on the application server

remove-domain.name: remove-domain
remove-domain.description: Remove and delete the domain on the application server

start-server.name: start-server
start-server.description: Starts of the application server with the domain

stop-server.name: stop-server
stop-server.description: Stops from the application server with the domain

restart-server.name: restart-server
restart-server.description: Stops and starts from the application server with the domain

start-database.name: start-database
start-database.description: Starts the builtin Derby database on the application server

stop-database.name: stop-database
stop-database.description: Stops the builtin Derby database on the application server
